nodes.label: Understand What AI Is
nodes.description: Learn about the basics of Artificial Intelligence, its history, goals, and applications.

nodes.label: Learn Python for AI
nodes.description: Master Python programming with a focus on libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib.

nodes.label: Master Machine Learning
nodes.description: Understand ML models including supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.

nodes.label: Dive into Deep Learning
nodes.description: Explore neural networks, CNNs, RNNs, transformers, and how they power modern AI.

nodes.label: Learn Prompt Engineering
nodes.description: Learn how to design effective prompts for large language models like GPT.

nodes.label: Explore AI Infrastructure
nodes.description: Understand vector databases, model serving, and deployment pipelines.
